alert.note: Alert for La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 9:58AM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 8 inches possible higher elevations, with total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches at lower elevations. Strong winds will produce widespread blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Leadville Vicinity and Lake County Below 11000 Feet, La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Feet, Upper Rio Grande Valley and Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Feet and Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Feet. * WHEN...From late tonight through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
